favourite.article: I am an elementary teacher and I am so happy to hear this.
Praise the Lord! Thank you for this children's song. We really are lucky that from all of God's creations man is the only one to love God.
Amen for this children's song. Man is special because man is created to love the Lord specially. Praise the Lord! We love Him and the Body.
It is a great song! Praise the Lord!
I love this song because it is a very happyish kind of song.
